English: Two days later, final push
The villa
Let's raise the flag!
Excellent work, comrade Kukushkiin. I knew I put my trust in the right person!
Hail, comrade commander Zubarev! Hail, comrade army general Volkov! And long live the Soviet Union!
TO THE SKY, COMRADES, AND STRAIGHT SOUTH. WE'RE FINISHING THIS TODAY.
THE FINAL PUSH, NIKOLAI! FINALLY THERE WILL BE PEACE!
I TRULY HOPE SO, IPPOLIT. IT WOULD BE A NICE CHANGE OF PACE.
I HAVE A SPECIAL DRINK FOR THE OCCASION - NOW WHERE DID I PUT IT? SHIT, I MUST HAVE LEFT IN THE TENT. WELL, ANOTHER THING TO LOOK FORWARD TO THEN!
ULYANA TO ALL UNITS, HEADING SOUTH. WEAPONS FREE, ALL IN, READY TO ROLL. OVER.
ANTON UNDERSTOOD. WE'LL BE COMING ALONG THE WESTERN ROAD. OVER.
BORIS HERE, EASTERN ROAD FOR US. WE'RE LOOKING FORWARD TO YOUR AIR SUPPORT. OVER.
LEONID IS HITTING THEIR CENTRE, GOING STRAIGHT FOR THEIR BASE. OUT.
FIREFLY TO ULYANA, DESTROY EVERYTHING THAT MOVES. KOLGUYEV SHALL BE OURS TODAY. FIREFLY OUT.
ANTON TO ALL UNITS, WE'VE ADVANCED IN THE WEST, ENEMY RESISTANCE BROKEN. OUT.
BORIS TO ALL UNITS, WE BROKE THROUGH THE WEST. FEW STRUGGLERS REMAIN, BUT WE'RE DONE. OUT.
LEONID TO ALL UNITS, THE BASE IS SECURED, ENEMY IS SURRENDERING, OUT.
ULYANA TO FIREFLY, OPEN UP THE VODKA, MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. WE'RE DONE HERE.
FIREFLY TO ULYANA, THERE ARE FEW SHIPS THAT SLIPPED OUR UNITS HEADING OVER THE SEA. TAKE CARE OF THEM. FIREFLY OUT.
UNDERSTOOD FIREFLY, CHANGING COURSE TO THE SOUTH SEA. OUT.
ALRIGHT, THAT'S TAKEN CARE OF. COMRADE ABLOMOV, LET'S TAKE THESE MACHINES HOME. WE'RE DONE HERE. OUT.
EH, COMRADE SYOMIN, EH, WHAT WAS THAT? OVER.
THOSE WERE RETREATING UNITS, COMRADE ABLOMOV. THEY ALSO CARRIED THE WHITE FLAG. WE ARE NOT SHOOTING ON THAT. NEVER FORGET YOUR MILITARY DISCIPLINE AND HONOUR EVEN IN WAR. ESPECIALLY IN A WAR. OUT.
I TOLD YOU, SYOMIN IS A FUCKING BEAST. LET'S GET THAT VODKA THEN, WE HAVE MUCH TO CELEBRATE!
Destroy the Last Enemy Forces
Destroy the Retreating Ships
